title: fastnode: fix some pbss saving&rewind issues;

body:
### Description

This PR tries to solve issue https://github.com/bnb-chain/bsc/issues/2829, the fast node reports `Failed to journal in-memory trie nodes` when stopping the node, reports `Head state missing, repairing` when restarting the node.

### Changes

Notable changes: 
* fastnode: fix some pbss saving&rewind issues;
